Returns: true if all chars in the range are to be considered in a RTL direction, false otherwise.
Parameters: int: the length to check, must not be negative and not greater than array.length - start.
isRtl(char[],int,int).Description: Guess if a chars array is in the RTL direction or not.
isRtl(char[],int,int).FullName: public abstract boolean isRtl (char[] array, int start, int count)

Returns: true if all chars in the range are to be considered in a RTL direction, false otherwise.
Parameters: int: the length to check, must not be negative and not greater than CharSequence.length() - start.
isRtl(java.lang.CharSequence, int, int).Description: Guess if a CharSequence is in the RTL direction or not.

ClassDesc: Interface for objects that use a heuristic for guessing at the paragraph direction by examining text.
